item.title: cecilion
item.description:
×
CECILION HD Wallpaper
❮ ❯

Many years ago, enjoying the night opera performed by Cecilion was the most popular form of entertainment for the people of Castle Aberleen. It was always full house at the theatre each time this most famous opera actor performed. Everyone was attracted by his indescribable beauty and talent. However, the applause, love and cheers from human beings didnâ€™t make Cecilion feel happy. He was one of the Blood Demons, and it was hard for him to open his mind to humans.
